subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Daniel Chopra birdied the last hole after Dudley Hart bogeyed it, giving him a two-shot lead with one round left at the Buick Open in Grand Blanc, Mich. Chopra made a 15-foot putt to close the third round at four under par.
snippet: Daniel Chopra birdied the last hole after Dudley Hart bogeyed it, giving him a two-shot lead with one round left at the Buick Open in Grand Blanc, Mich. Chopra made a 15-foot putt to close the third round at four under par.
